messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] web site that defines homeschoolering  families
messages.msgSnippet: ... == I don t *think* it was me, but I could be wrong.  Have you tried looking in the archives? Just a thought :) Todd ... Despite the high cost of living
messages.messageBody:
At 09:05 AM 10/4/02 -0600, Lisa Hardiman wrote:

>Last week someone posted a web site that had a beautiful definition of a
>Homeschooling family. Could someone post the address for me. Was it Todd
>who posted it?
==
I don't *think* it was me, but I could be wrong. <g> Have you tried looking
in the archives? Just a thought :)

Todd
-------------------------------------
"Despite the high cost of living
it's still extremely popular!"
http://rambleman.tripod.com/index.html

messages.subject: web site that defines homeschoolering families
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Unschoolers:  Last week someone posted a web site that had a beautiful definition of a Homeschooling family.  Could someone post the address for me.  Was
messages.messageBody:
Dear Unschoolers: Last week someone posted a web site that had a
beautiful definition of a Homeschooling family. Could someone post the
address for me. Was it Todd who posted it? Sorry, I am 41 and still
scattered. Lisa of MT
